name: Christmas star t-shirt
description:
Perfect for wearing on Christmas day but not so naff that you can't wear it all year long.

White 100% cotton short-sleeved t-shirt, hand-screen printed with red environmentally friendly and non-toxic ink.

Size 0/1 - 30 cm across chest

Size 2/3 - 32.5 cm across chest 

Size 4/5 - 35 cm across chest

Size 6/7 - 37.5 cm across chest

name: Gift wrapping
description:
Giving someone the gift of Mini Mayhem?

Then why not have it gorgeously gift wrapped.

Gift wrapped parcels will not include the invoice.  

Please let us know if you would like to add a small handwritten card.

name: Whale of a time boys shorts
description:
We love whales around here.  All kinds, even the "killer" kind who get a pretty bad wrap.  But especially happy smiley whales like the ones on these gorgeous blue shorts.

Made from 100% cotton with a fully adjustable elasticated waist. The side and crotch seams are triple stitched for those who wear their clothes hard.

These shorts are on the smaller size.  Please consider going up a size.

Available in sizes 1, 4, 5 & 6
(Sizes 2 & 3 SOLD OUT)

name: Time Travel blue adult t-shirt
description:
Fancy a bit of time travelling?  Then why not step into one of these popular time travel devices.  Can you name them all?

Obviously the Tardis is there, along with the Delorean, but did you get Bill & Ted's telephone booth?  And of course, it's a hot tub, on a shirt about time machines ... Hot Tub time machine!!!

We know that we've missed a few other great time machines but we had to draw the line somewhere.  Our only regret is that we didn't include Homer Simpson's toaster!!

White ink on a 100% blue cotton t-shirt. 

Only available in adult sizes at this stage.  

Measurements:

Mens
Size S - 46 cm (length - 68 cm)
Size M - 51 cm (length - 70 cm)
Size L - 56 cm (length - 73 cm)
Size XL - 61 cm (length - 75 cm) - SOLD OUT
